title.en: Estonian for Beginners II (100% Web-Based). Level A1.1 - A1.2
title.et: Eesti keel algtasemele II (100% e-õpe), tase A1.1 - A1.2

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

name.en: Department of Languages of the Baltic Region

structural_unit_name.en: Department of Languages of the Baltic Region

description.en:
The chapters of the course:
1. My home
2. Professions and work
3. Health
4. Clothing
5. Travelling and transport
6. Seasons and weather
description.et:
Kursuse teemad:
1. Minu kodu.
2. Elukutsed ja töö.
3. Tervis.
4. Riietus.
5. Reisimine ja transport.
6. Aastaajad ja ilm.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to get a basic knowledge of Estonian through different topics and exercises and to get skills to participate in simple conversations.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on saada algteadmisi eesti keelest erinevate teemade ja harjutuste kaudu. Kursusel osalemine annab baasoksusesd osalemaks lihtsamates vestlustes.

learning_outcomes.en: After completing the course, the student:
- can use the basic vocabulary and grammar for the level A1.2;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab kasutada A1.2 taseme vastavat baassõnavara ja grammatilisi vorme;

learning_outcomes.en: - is able to participate in simple daily conversations;
learning_outcomes.et: - saab hakkama lihtsamates suhtlussituatsioonides tänaval, poes, arsti kabinetis, seltskonnas ja reisides;

learning_outcomes.en: - can talk and write about her/himself, about profession and work, health, travelling and weather.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab rääkida ja kirjutada endast, oma tervisest, elukutsest, reisimisest ja ilmast.

grade_evaluation.et:
The grading of the course is only partially automatic.

The tests and exercises are graded automatically by Moodle in points.

The lecturer will grade and give feedback for the "Write a text... exercises" within three weeks after the deadline.

There are three tests in total, one after every four weeks. The exercises must be completed BEFORE the tests! Please note the deadlines!

You can get in a total of 80 points for the course:

Write a text: My favorite room. - 5 points
Write a text: My studies and profession.- 5 points
Write a text. My closet. - 5 points
Write a text. Where have you traveled in Estonia? - 5 points

Note the deadlines of the writing tasks!

NB! Each of these four exercises HAVE TO BE DONE for at least 50% to get to the final grading!

TESTS
I Test - 10 points
II Test - 10 points
III Test - 10 points

For doing all the exercises - 30 points

One minus point for every uncompleted exercise (less than 50% of the answers are correct), if there are more than 25 exercises uncompleted, then one will not get points for exercises. If more than 50 exercises are not completed before the deadline (less than 50% of the answers are correct) then the student can not pass this course. Please note the deadline of the exercises.

NB! TO GET TO THE FINAL GRADING, all the tests, writing tasks and exercises have to be completed on time and for the result more than 50% of the maximum (at least 2,5 points for the essay and 5 points for each test)!

The final grading in percentages from the total points (80)
90-100% - "A"
80-89% - "B"
70-79% - "C"
60-69% - "D"
50-59% - "E"
Less than 50% - "F"

debt_elimination.et: There will be a certain date provided at the end of the semester to retake the tests (in the class room).

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
